title: The Reaper's Quota
description: Meet Grim Reaper #2497. Behind on his work, he must complete his quota of thirty Random Deaths or face termination in the worst way. Faced with an insurmountable task and very little time to complete it, Reaper #2497 struggles to hang on to the one thing he's not supposed to have - his humanity.Finalist - Book Blogger's Novel of the Year Award 2022Finalist - Next Generation Indie Book Awards First Novel Category 2023Finalist - The Authors' Zone 2023
author: Sarah McKnight
